intro: You are in a museum like room with 3 statues and a locked door on the other side. A table stands next to you

magnifying glass.statue 1: You use the magnifying glass to see that it has the number 1 on it
magnifying glass.statue 2: You use the magnifying glass to see that it has the number 4 on it
magnifying glass.statue 3: You use the magnifying glass to see that it has the number 3 on it

interactions.statue 1: It is a statue of a person but you don't know who
interactions.statue 2: It is a statue of a person but you don't know who
interactions.statue 3: It is a statue of a person but you don't know who
interactions.table: The table has a magnifying glass on it
interactions.door: The door has a keycode on it it requires 3 numbers
